title: Wondershare Video Editor v6.0.0 Mac OS X {B4tman}
description:
Wondershare Video Editor v6.0.0 Mac OS X {B4tman}
 
http://s18.postimg.org/7kx6ik4ex/image.jpg 
http://s18.postimg.org/5hmraw4m1/image.png

Description:-

Wondershare Video Editor for Mac is an easy-to-use yet powerful Mac video editing software to edit and retouch videos with rich video and photo editing functions like trimming, cropping, rotating, adding stylish titles, applying filter effects, inserting transition and motion effects, etc. Furthermore, you can export videos to various popular video formats and portable devices for wider sharing and enjoyment or directly upload them to YouTube for sharing with family and friends. It also enables you to burn videos to DVD discs for better video preservation.

Features:-

â€¢ Picture-in-Picture: Have multiple videos or images displayed in the same frame! Enrich your video story with even more appealing visual experiences.
â€¢ Green Screen (Chroma Key): Make your very own DIY Chroma Key Green Screen and get professional video effects like the ones you seen in movie theater!
â€¢ Playback Speed Control: You are the Action Director! Take control of playback speed in your video clips.
â€¢ Audio Separation: Extract the original audio track from the video footage, and edit the sound separately from the video element on the same timeline scale.
â€¢Tiltâ€¢Shift Effect: Transform the subject(s) in your footage to create surreal & fascinating miniatures.
â€¢ Auto Enhance: Instantly improves your picture quality to help people, places and other details look their best.
â€¢ Scene Detection: Automatically detect scene changes in footage and create a new clip for each different scene.
â€¢ Stunning Filter Effects: Choose from over 80 classic, creative and professionally designed filters, drag-and-drop to apply them directly to your video clips.
â€¢ Dynamic Transitions: There are 59 stunning transition effects for you to choose from.
â€¢ Dynamic Transitions: There are 59 stunning transition effects for you to choose from.
â€¢ Text Effects: Pick from the 19 different engaging customizable text effects.
â€¢ Intros and Credits: Personalize your movie with the 13 trendy and proâ€¢looking intros as well as end credits templates.
â€¢ Sound Effects: Raise your creativity to the next level with a large selection of sound effects.
â€¢ Advanced Editing with Limitless Possibilities: Create spectacular professional-looking home videos with multi-track timeline, overlay footage, PIP objects, green screen effects, and many many advanced editing features, cause we know, your creativity has no limit!
â€¢ Share Your Works: Showcase your creativity with your family, friends and the rest of the world! You can easily publish your masterpiece in so many ways.
â€¢ TAKE SNAPSHOTS: Capture your favorite moments with quick snapshots as youre previewing the footage.
â€¢ FAVORITE COLLECTION: Save text templates, filters, transitions and special effects to your favorites for easy access during future projects.
â€¢ RECORD VOICEOVER: Record voiceovers and add fun narrations to help engage your audiences.
â€¢ PREVIEW IN FULL SCREEN: Double-check your work in real-time and full screen.
â€¢ TIMELINE/STORYBOARD: Switch between Timeline and Storyboard modes at any time to do basic and more advanced editing.
â€¢ RESOURCE BROWSER: A user-friendly tool to preview and import media files.

System Requirements:-

Operating System: OS X 10.7 or later
Language: Multilangual
